entry.title: haoxiang-xu/PuPu: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

entry.title: oldmagic/scanme: ScanMe is a lightweight React library that generates QR codes for cryptocurrency wallet addresses. It features a customizable dropdown that displays a QR code based on a provided list of coins using the qrcode package, ensuring quick and easy integration.
entry.content: ScanMe is a lightweight React library that generates QR codes for cryptocurrency wallet addresses. It features a customizable dropdown that displays a QR code based on a provided list of coins using the qrcode package, ensuring quick and easy integration.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: itsfuad/XebecServer-Deno: Xebec Server is a lightweight HTTP server featuring routing, middleware, and nested routing capabilities for Deno projects. It supports RESTful route definitions with dynamic parameters and integrates seamlessly with Socket.IO for real-time applications.
